name: Dagangan Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of an online distribution platform designed to help businesses to connect with consumers in rural villages. The company's tech platform supports a hub-and-spoke distribution model, that serves rural consumers by providing access for rural consumers to purchase daily necessities products offered by a network of principals or producers at affordable prices, enabling businesses to cut costs and reach out to more customers with data-driven production and supply-chain distribution of their products.
one_liner: Developer of an online distribution platform designed to help businesses to connect with consumers in rural villages. The company's tech platform supports a hub-and-spoke distribution model, that serves rural consumers by providing access for rural consumers to purchase daily necessities products offered by a network of principals or producers at affordable prices, enabling businesses to cut costs and reach out to more customers with data-driven production and supply-chain distribution of their products.
